Enterprise Solutions.subHeader: Streamline your systems, save time and resources, and generate new revenue using the same platforms created, tested, and proven through our years of working with organizations just like yours.
Enterprise Solutions.Text1: At ASTM, were partnering with organizations to provide the technical infrastructure to help your team work smarter, collaborate more effectively, and expand your brand.
Enterprise Solutions.Text2: Whether you need to access and promote or collaborate and comply, we have a solution to upgrade your current technology and increase your productivity.
Enterprise Solutions.Text3: Our modern solutions for collaboration and content delivery have been custombuilt by a team of internal experts. A team that has spent decades working with and listening to the most important needs of our members and customers who use standards every day.

Enterprise Solutions1.text1: Give your staff all the content
Enterprise Solutions1.Text1: Give your staff all the content they need with companywide digital access to 13,000+ ASTM standards, as well as content from
Enterprise Solutions1.Text2: Expand your audience to thousands of potential customers when you add your standards, codes, and other technical documents to ASTM Compass. Or create your own licensebased content portal powered by ASTM Compass technology, for your subscribers only.
Enterprise Solutions1.Text3: Collaborate, create, and publish internal documents using the same intelligent digital collaboration tool used to develop thousands of ASTM standards.
Enterprise Solutions1.text4: Take advantage of a full suite
Enterprise Solutions1.Text4: Take advantage of a full suite of multimedia services to create professional digital media to help streamline your internal training processes and preserve institutional knowledge.
